definition: seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)
to overlook/to look down from a height
to dive down fast/to swoop down
to lean over/to bend over/to stoop/to bow
lowering and raising of the head/(fig.) small move/pitch (position angle)
lit. so numerous that one could just bend down and pick them up (idiom)/fig. extremely common/easily available
to rock one's body backward and forward/to be convulsed (with laughter etc)
see 俯拾皆是[fu3 shi2 jie1 shi4]
bowed head and ears glued (idiom); docile and obedient/at sb's beck and call
to deign/to condescend/to yield to (entreaties)/to submit to (sb)/(polite) to deign to accept (a post)

sentences.english: And he reached down and touched her - and gave her life.
sentences.chinese: 他俯下身，抚摸着她，给了她生命。

sentences.english: I leaned over and touched my forehead to hers.
sentences.chinese: 我俯下身，用我的前额贴着她的额头。

sentences.english: Dumbledore and Professor McGonagall bent forward over the bundle of blankets.
sentences.chinese: 邓布利多和麦格教授朝那卷毛毯俯下身去。

sentences.english: She lays her head down, against his chest, listening to his heartbeat.
sentences.chinese: 她俯下身去，头靠在杰克的胸膛上，听着他的心跳。

sentences.english: I'm deeply touched by the municipal government's performance and care for the people.
sentences.chinese: 市政俯关心群众的举动，令我深受感动。

sentences.english: He leant over and gently kissed her.
sentences.chinese: 他俯下身温柔的吻了她。

sentences.english: Barkis Bittern : Can a heart still break after it's stopped beating?
sentences.chinese: 茸心停止俯跳动挂了辟以颜后还会痛么？

sentences.english: She opened her eyes and looked up at me with curiosity and hopefulness.
sentences.chinese: 她张开着了眼睛，用充满好奇和期待的眼神俯看着我。

sentences.english: In the soft moonlight, he looked down pointedly at her mouth for several seconds.
sentences.chinese: 柔和的月光下，他俯看着她的嘴，凝滞数秒。

sentences.english: Coph. Thou hast heard my voice: turn not away thy ear from my sighs, and cries.
sentences.chinese: 你曾俯听过我的呼声，对我的哀祷，不要掩耳不闻。

sentences.english: It was built in Qin Dyansty and rebuilt in Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 它始建于秦汉赵孟俯和明代重建。

sentences.english: I bend and I break not.
sentences.chinese: 我只要俯下身去，就折不断。

definition: to lean over/to bend over/to stoop/to bow
to face upward/to look up/to admire/to rely on
to straighten one's back/to arch one's back
